SEARCH
Package com.ccprog3.myfarm

Class BitMap

java.lang.Object
com.ccprog3.myfarm.BitMap
public class BitMap extends Object
The static Bitmap class. For bitmap manipulation. This is only used for game over condition checking.
Author:
John Joseph F. Giron

  • Constructor Details

    • BitMap

      public BitMap()

  • Method Details

    • getBitBool

      public static boolean getBitBool(int bitmap, int position)
      Gets the Boolean value of the bit of index position in the bitmap
      Parameters:
      bitmap - The bitmap in question
      position - The position of the bit
      Returns:
      Returns the Boolean representation of the bit
      0 - false
      1 - true

    • getBitInt

      public static int getBitInt(int bitmap, int position)
      Gets the integer value of the bit of index position in the bitmap
      Parameters:
      bitmap - The bitmap in question
      position - The position of the bit
      Returns:
      Returns the integer value (0 or 1) of the bit

    • setBit

      public static int setBit(int bitmap, int position, boolean set)
      Sets the bit of index position in the bitmap.
      Parameters:
      bitmap - The bitmap in question
      position - The position of the bit
      set - the new bit to replace the old bit with.
      Returns:
      Returns the changed bitmap. No integer pointer in Java, though.
